name: 1z1xxx3001
description: An advanced pixel sorting effect with customizable thresholds, direction, noise, randomness, and strip control.

paramDescriptions.threshold_min: Minimum pixel value to be sorted (based on selected sorting style).
paramDescriptions.threshold_max: Maximum pixel value to be sorted (based on selected sorting style).
paramDescriptions.randomness: Percentage of intervals that remain unsorted, introducing randomness.
paramDescriptions.direction: Sort direction (horizontal or vertical). Determines the axis along which sorting happens.
paramDescriptions.strip_width: Width of each sorting strip, adjusting the size of each block affected by the sorting.
paramDescriptions.strip_spacing: Space between pixel-sorted strips (can be negative for overlap).
paramDescriptions.pulling_distance: How far the pixels are pulled from their original position based on sorting order.
paramDescriptions.sorting_style: Defines sorting based on Hue (0), Saturation (1), or Lightness (2).
paramDescriptions.noise_strength: Strength of the added noise, applied uniformly across the image.
